Beta being chased and doted on by Alpha?

Chased by his childhood friend, Mizuki is an Alpha and Alice is a Beta, trying his best to live his high school life.

One day, Mizuki’s fateful fiancée, the Omega Shion, transferred to another school …!

Furthermore, the other is an Alpha’s ……!

Why me, a Beta? I want my ordinary, normal life back ~ !!>
